common.check_network: Please check API configuration or network connection

torrent.dmca_text: If you believe this content infringes your copyright, please submit a DMCA complaint.

about.title: About Us
about.overview_text: {siteName} is a magnet link search engine based on the DHT network. We join the DHT network through the BitTorrent protocol, collecting data in real-time, and store only basic information such as file title, size, file list, and file identifier (magnet link).
about.overview_text2: {siteName} does not download or store any actual resources, providing only search and indexing services. This means {siteName} is a completely legal search engine system.
about.usage_text: The results returned by {siteName} are magnet links, which does not mean you can download resources directly. You need to use download tools (such as Xunlei, QQ Xuanfeng, BitComet, etc.) to download resources.
about.usage_text2: If you have any questions, please contact us via email, and we will respond within 48 hours.
about.disclaimer_text: {siteName} does not store any resource content, only collects BT resource metadata (such as file name, file size) and magnet links (BT torrent identifiers), and provides query services.
about.disclaimer_text2: If the data we collect infringes on your legal rights, please contact us via email, and we will delete or block it within 48 hours.

dmca.title: DMCA Copyright Complaint
notice_items: Please ensure you own the copyright or represent the copyright owner
Provide detailed complaint reasons and copyright proof
False complaints may result in legal liability
We will process your complaint within 1-3 business days

form.name: Your Name
form.reason_placeholder: Please describe the infringement in detail...
form.proof_hint: Please provide a link to copyright proof (e.g., copyright certificate, authorization letter)

dmca.success_message: We have received your DMCA complaint and will process it within 1-3 business days.
